Thanks for the game mate.
i dont seem to be able to get this train to move am i doing something wrong
Do the first scenario the tutorial one..  Its important to run the train.
Getting a massage that something wrong was happened, and ts2013 crashes. Any idea? Thanks
it just stops loading and complains some wagons are missing. How do you make this run on RW?

First of all , thank you very much uploader.
Secondly , to all those who cannot get the train to move , do the first scenario , the one which says learn to drive .... 
You'll understand how to change the power supply to get the Train Moving
When I load the route there is nothing there just a grey bord with lines did I install it wrong?
Same here as redtail1, it says can't load rail vehicle and the scenery is just grey with lines on it. When installing, should you do something else than just copy/paste in the right folder?

Thank you for the file.

To install, copy contents (assets, contents, manuals) over to the games directory. Something like this- 
C:Program Files(x86)Steamsteamappscommonrailworks
I get the error that the models "Class 395" is missing. Please, tpb_4_ever, upload these classes too, otherwise this pack can not work for me.
